title: 2023 Year in Review: top-level management rejig hit Indiaâ€™s IT services firms
description: From Infosys and TCS to Wipro and Tech Mahindra, top-level management in Indian IT majors underwent a major churn in 2023. ETtech looks at it.
content: The $245-billion Indian IT sector, which is still reeling under global macroeconomic volatility, saw clients slashing their budgets even as companies faced major top-level management changes in 2023. ETtech looks back at some of the key developments.
